title: Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D., Volume 2: Under New Management
description: Agent Coulson and his crew are caught in the middle of Civil War II, and opinions are split among them. But they remain Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. and have a job to do: Protect the innocent and apprehend a major Marvel Universe character. As they near their target, divisions begin to grow and positions harden, but what's on Coulson's mind may change everything!Collecting: Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. 7-10; The Accused
author: Marc Guggenheim
